Turbine Purchase NorthWestern Guaranty Cc the following annotations on NEW EMAIL ADDRESSES AT PAUL HASTINGS JANOFSKY WALKER LLP We have changed our email address Our new domain name is paulhastingscom In most cases our address is composed of conventional first name and last name plus paulhastingscom Here are two examples and If you have any questions please contact us at The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from all computers In connection with the above referenced matter attached for your review is an initial draft ofthe NorthWestern Guaranty the Guaranty Please note that the Guaranty has not been reviewed by NorthWestern and therefore remains subject in all respects to NorthWesterns review and comments Please contact me with any questions or comments Jeremiah A DeBerry Esq Paul Hastings Janofsky Walker LLP Park Avenue New York New York Phone Fax NW Agreement GuarantyvWPD

Comments to Turbine Purchase Documents Cc forwarded to you via facsimile our comments to the Letter Agreement and the LLC Agreement The majority of our comments as you will note are intended to clarify the understanding of the parties with respect to the various matters set forth in such documents and are not intended to chang e the deal Except that upon the advise of our tax counsel we have adjust ed the amounts of the promissory notes to be issued in connection with the transaction in order to maximize the LLCs basis in the Turbines We be lieve this is consistent with your initial draft of the Letter Agreement Also please note that we have included additional language in Section of the Letter Agreement which provides NorthWestern with the opportunity to consult with GE on matters relating to the Turbines This reflects our understanding of an agreement that had been reached among the parties With respect to the LLC Agreement we would like to discuss with you the following i the timing of the exercise of the Call Right and ii the intent of your proposed language in Section relating to the rights of ea ch Member to act in its own best interests with respect to the Call and Put RightsTo that end we propose scheduling a conference call on Tuesday afternoon April Please contact me as soon as possible with a ti me that is convenientforyour team We look forward to hearing from you Note We will forward to you shortlyrevised drafts of the documents for which wehave drafting responsibility Jeremiah A DeBerry Esq Paul Hastings Janofsky Walker LLP Park Avenue New York New York Phone Fax

RE Montana Megawatts I LLCThanks for your response Kay May I assume that you are ok with the draft of the letter we forwarded to you on Wednesday of last week regarding revised pay off amounts If yes I will revise that letter and have it executed by NorthWestern Original Message From Mann Kay mailtoKay NRONcom Sent Monday November PM To DeBerry Jeremiah A Subject RE Montana Megawatts I LLC Hi Jerry Steve told me that he had asked whoever he spoke to at NorthWestern to take steps to extinguish the letter agreement that Enron and GE regarding the transaction I have prepared a letter to that effect and sent it to Steve for his review Basically it just says that Enron doesnt have any continuing obligations to GE under the previous letter Before we release the funds we would like to get an executed revised letter fromN orthWestern concerning the revised set off amounts and final total to bew ired My fax number is I did not have the certificate signed but will dig it out and see what I can do Quite frankly I just overlooked it Kay Original Message From DeBerry Jeremiah A mailto Sent Monday November PM To Mann Kay Subject Montana Megawatts I LLC Kay please advise me via email of the results of your discussion with Steve Swift Also please confirm to me via email that you will send to me via facsimile simultaneously with the the payment of the Remaining Purchase Amount Refund Amount copies of the certificate evidencing Enrons interest in Montana Megawatts I LLC along with the Membership Interest Power executed by Enron In addition I ask that you forward originals of such documents to me via overnight courier for next day delivery Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions Thanks Jeremiah A DeBerry Esq Paul Hastings Janofsky Walker LLP Park Avenue New York New York Phone Fax paulhastingscom made the following annotations on The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from all computers For additional information on Paul Hastings Janofsky Walker LLP please see our website at contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you paulhastingscom made the following annotations on The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information
